description: Smallest positive integer for which n divides a(n)^4.
comments: If n is 5th-power-free (i.e., not 32, 64, 128, 243, ...) then a(n) = A007947(n).Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^(ceiling(e/4)). - _Christian G. Bower_, May 16 2005
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Smarandache Ceil Function.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,2] = ceil(f[i,2]/4)); factorback(f); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 09 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 29 2000
